description:
Email marketing's ROI is 4,300% according to Kissmetrics, a prominent marketing blog.

By taking this course you too will be able to capitalize on these tremendous returns.

I'll walk you step-by-step through how to plan and implement a sales funnel for your ecommerce store.

Learn how to setup email autoresponders that are engaging and turn your subscribers into paying customers and then take those customers and offer upsells to increase their lifetime value ... all through email automation ... making it pretty much "hands off" once you've got it setup.

Also included are 9 Fill-In-The-Blank email series templates (28 pre-written emails) that are plug & play ... rapidly decreasing your setup time.

So ... what are you waiting for? Click the Green "Take This Course" button to get started!
title: How To Build A Sales Funnel For Your Ecommerce Store
